content.raw:
I made a few tweaks in this [branch](#!/osrf/haptix-comm/branches/compare/read_sensors_caguero..read_sensors#diff):

* Remove the `hx_sensor.c` example. It's almost the same as `hx_requester`, so I included the call to `hx_readsensors()` in the file `hx_requester`. We'll have less code to maintain.
* I created a private function `convert()` that converts from a protobuf sensor msg to a C struct.
* Minor tweaks.

Feel free to use it or not.
content.html:
I made a few tweaks in this branch:

  • Remove the hx_sensor.c example. It's almost the same as hx_requester, so I included the call to hx_readsensors() in the file hx_requester. We'll have less code to maintain.
  • I created a private function convert() that converts from a protobuf sensor msg to a C struct.
  • Minor tweaks.

Feel free to use it or not.
